mapper.select: select a.*,b.* from cle_dif_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.*,b.* from cle_dif_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id where order_cle_orderid = #{orderCleOrderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.*,b.* from cle_dif_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select (count(1) + 1) as serial from cle_dif_order where date_format(order_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into cle_dif_order (order_id, order_no, order_datetime, order_cle_orderid, order_cle_orderno, order_amount, order_statusid,order_paytype) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCleOrderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCleOrderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER})

order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

order_paytype = #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
